website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice with convenient features that give the user greater control.
pros: The brushless motor in this blower can deliver up to 450 cu
ft. of air per minute at top speeds of 120 MPH
The variable speed trigger and the ambidextrous cruise control offer the user precision control over the machine's power
cons: It is important to note that this is the tool only, the battery is sold separately

customer_reviews.title: Get the correct battery
customer_reviews.text: First of all this thing is awesome! Looks great, good power, and good weight distribution. I purchased the battery separately. I did the research and because I also have the Milwaukee M18 weed whacker that I purchased a 9.0 mah battery for I decided to get the 12.0 (massive and heavy) mah battery that is sold with the chainsaw... it was a great choice! I have a fairly large yard with 5 tall aspen/poplar trees that completely cover the yard with leaves in the fall and I’ve never run out of battery once with either the 9.0 or 12.0 battery.
customer_reviews.author: Tsunami

customer_reviews.title: Also needs a battery and a charger but highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight properly balanced powerful blower. Very useful high and low speed button with a variable speed trigger. You'll need to buy a battery and charger pushing the cost over $250.00 but its a very high quality tool and worth the money. I use it to remove leaves from my garage and easily blows pollen and debris from my flagstone patio and BBQ place. Great saw dust mover. Battery has four LEDs indicating power use. Ive never run it down past 2 lights. If stolen I would buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: TCG

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 9 amp battery and it easily runs long enough to blow my long driveway and rear deck. It may not be quite as powerful as a gas blower, but it's pretty close. With the 9 amp battery it is a bit heavy for an 83 year-old guy, but I manage without notable pain the next day. I'm impressed with this machine. I recommend it, but if a woman is going to use it, I would suggest buying two smaller amperage batteries to reduce weight.
customer_reviews.author: Velho

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and time saving
customer_reviews.text: This is a very portable and powerful blower. So far I have used it to clear light snow off the sidewalks, driveway and cars. Also leaves and cut grass off the patio and light snow off the deck. A good investment. I feel it should be paired with a nine amp hour battery as a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Milwaukee has yet to fail me!
customer_reviews.text: This blower is very, very, strong! Could not be happier with you. If you’re planning to do large project cleanup etc., you ought to have several batteries ready because it goes through them rather quickly. I Purchased it for small, quick, cleanup’s in the garage, and the back porch. If not be happier with its overall power.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Better have the big batteries, it uses plenty of juice. Pretty good product overall.
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty good. Not super heavy, pretty well balanced, and has pretty decent grunt for an electric. Do not expect it to replace tour gas blower, but it is great for small cleanup jobs, and for getting really hot fires stoked. Nice thing is, no starting, no exhaust, no gas smell or spills. Only downfall is battery life- even with the 8.0aH battery, expect 10-15 minutes running full tilt. I understand the physics, moving air at these speeds and volume requires quite a great deal of energy. Hard to believe these same batteries in my 1” impact will remove and install several semi truck tires on the same charge. Either way, a convenient supplement to your yard care tools.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this thing. He thought there wasn't going to be enough power but there is. He uses it all the time to blow off leaves and such.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy B

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee M18 Leaf Blower
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great tool for garage clean up a "Breeze" puts out exactly what it states I paid a little more than I wanted to. Home Depot would not ship it to me since I am 252 air miles away from them...Thank you Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Will The Thrill

customer_reviews.title: Lots of wind
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful blower for yard or shop use. I have some M18 Fuel tools so it was a good compliment to them and will make extra use of my batteries and charger. I like the variable speed trigger and did not have any trouble figuring out the shift from low to high range as others say -- and I never even read the manual. If you wear loose clothing the intake can be a little troublesome but I don't so it's not. Very lightweight, won't wear out your arm.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This BLOWS!
customer_reviews.text: For a little sized blower it packs a punch, blew off a 70 ft driveway in 7 minutes, customer was as impressed as I am. The only down side is it eats a 6Ah battery in 8 minutes on high. I have some new 8 Ah high output batteries, we'll see if it lasts a little longer. Pro's light weight, duel speed, plenty of power Con's Battery life is very short on high power
customer_reviews.author: Handyman247 LLC

customer_reviews.title: Electric motor blower is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: If your like me you've had a few 2 stroke blowers. The plugs foul, you need a 2-stroke gas mix at your fingertips, and starting can be either easy or challenging enough to wrap it around a tree. The Milwaukee M18 with the battery is a breeze to operate. As long as you keep a charge and have battery juice, just pull the trigger and aim. When your done, hang it back on the garqage hook and walk away. No gas smell, leaks or burning yourself on the muffler. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gregen8

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick work.
customer_reviews.text: It works awesome for blowing grass off the driveway and sidewalks. Even though it has a slow mode and a fast mode the trigger still has a variable resistor in it. I like that. It goes through a battery real quick. I might consider something else at peak fall time but, it works well for quick stuff. I use it way more often than my bigger blowers because it's so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Goodtwist

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool, make sure you have a higher amp hour battery pack
customer_reviews.text: This works quite well but it will drain batteries quickly. I tried a 2.4aH battery and that lasted only several minutes. The 5aH battery lasted about 10 solid minutes. There are 2 speeds to help preserve the battery life and the lower speed handled pretty much most of my needs.
customer_reviews.author: matt's long commute

customer_reviews.title: Wow...great little blower
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the cordless and the POWER...it rocks! I use it to blow off the rubber matting in my horse arena (walkways)...it can blow off 80' of rubber matting as fast as I can walk down the aisle. Awesome job on yard leaves...worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: hsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love the brand just not the leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: The battery is in a weird spot. It doesn't last very long before needing a new battery. The charger I bought separately doesn't charge quick. I really wish I just bought an electric one and extenssion cord instead of spending so much money.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa C DeVoe

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I'm a contractor and have all Milwaukee tools at this time. I applied for the cc and recieved $125 free so I said let's give it a shot. WOW power A+ I clean my trailer, tools and clients property. Cuts my cleanup time in half. Should have done it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Has awesome power! Able to do my deck driveway sidewalks and still have battery life left. Wish I would of bought it sooner. My wife uses it more than I do now! I own a lot of Milwaukee power tools, this another awesome tool thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new leaf blower. I feel like the battery is a little expensive ($130) and since it only last about 15 minutes when used on high speed, he really needs a second battery. Hopefully they'll go on sale soon so I can get a second battery. Other than that, it's perfect and very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lightweight. Quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Plenty of power. Pick it up, use it. Put it back down. Very light and easy to handle. Great force. Battery life is more then enough with my 12ah battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as a gas Stihl leaf blower.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I can eliminate all gas consuming tools and all things considered it does a good job but it is not quite as powerful as a gas Stihl leaf blower.
customer_reviews.author: Kintner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blower needs a better battery than a 2 hour rated one.
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple other Milwaukee battery operated tools that use 2 hour batteries. This blower uses up a 2 hour battery in 5 minutes on hihg speed and a bit longer on slow speed. I will be looking for a six hour battery.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little machine
customer_reviews.text: This blower is light weight and sturdy. Being battery operated allows me to use it easily in ares where a gas or electric blower is more cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: nice power
customer_reviews.text: i love this thing. it has plenty of power off the milwaukee battery. so nice to not have to string up a power cord to clean up around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my dad! He absolutely loves it and says it works great! Sorry for the short review but the product wasn’t for myself so it’s hard to add extra details.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice blower works well and serves its purpose very powerful. Have not disappointed yet happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha L. Clay Smith

customer_reviews.title: I was Impress with this product, Ii was given as a Gift to someone.
customer_reviews.text: The Person This Product was given to was Very Happy Thank You Very Much .
customer_reviews.author: gary day

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cordless Blower
customer_reviews.text: This cordless blower performs as well as a small backpack Echo blower we've had a several years. I'll never go back to gas. I suggest getting at least the 9Ah Milwaukee battery pack. While a bit pricier, the 12Ah is best.
customer_reviews.author: Scott N.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After researching many, this was by far the best choice for price, efficiency, lightweight
customer_reviews.author: mjmOrlean

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!  Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Just what I had hoped for. It took me too long to order this item because I have several M18 items and love them all. This was no different.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Rivera

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my son. He loved it! So did I! Which means I going to need to buy me one too! Powerful without all the weight of the gas one. Milwaukee makes great products and I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Best investment- brand recommended by a friend.. it’s awesome- powerful- long battery life. Quality product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power to move snow and leaves.
customer_reviews.text: I can clear the deck of snow without breaking a sweat. Sweeping the garage out is so fast with this blower. This for my husband but I’d like it to
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Very Powerful Tool
customer_reviews.text: I'm having way too much fun with this tool! It's a beast, and more powerful than I expected, using a 5 Ah battery pack. Very happy with it. Once again, Milwaukee delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Henry A. Meinig

customer_reviews.title: A convenient and powerful leaf blower.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great leaf blower; pop the battery on and its ready to go in 3 seconds-no fiddling with oil and gas and pulling a cord 20 times to start it. It's fairly lightweight and powerful enough to clean all the leaves and debris from my deck, front porch, sidewalk and driveway. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ector

customer_reviews.title: Power battery blower
customer_reviews.text: I use this blower to get rid of the leaves and grass clippings from my porch and it does a wonderful job. The fast setting really kicks a punch. 😁😁👊🏼
customer_reviews.author: Bike1966

customer_reviews.title: Great battery blower!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life could be better but overall we love this! It acts as the perfect snow blower for our sidewalks. We get about 30 minutes of use out of the batter. We’ve used it for leaves and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa VanLeuven

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Milwaukee you know it’s a beast
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blower. For a battery powered blower I don’t think anyone can beat a Milwaukee
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I have already used it much more than I had expected. The M18 battery system holds charge for a very long time. I have yet to use one up in a single use application. Not to mention the interchangeability with my other M18 tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has a lot of power. Really helps me get debris off my roof. Do yourself a favor and get the bigger battery. It eats through the smaller drill batteries really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Rory A.

customer_reviews.title: Product was correct but was repackaged
customer_reviews.text: I order the tool only but the box I received had previously been opened. The box was for the tool, battery and charger. Those items had been removed and the box was taped all back up. Makes me nervous that anyone is able to sell items on here.
customer_reviews.author: Juliann Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow , just as powerful as my gas operated blower!!! Never disappointed with Milwaukee!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing power and convenience!
customer_reviews.text: Was really surprised at the power of this unit over the corded one that it replaced. And the convenience makes this choice a no brainier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Highly recommended. I had the M18 for a few drills so bought this leaf blower so i could use the same batteries. Simple and easy to use. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: jordanpeterson1

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee Battery Blower
customer_reviews.text: Works great blowing off sidewalks after a grass cut and blowing out garage and driveway.Would recommend for short uses.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Quick buy fast shipping It cleans my patio and driveway without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: milton chocooj

customer_reviews.title: It woo
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use a 4.0 lithium battery and I have used it for nearly an hour a couple of times an have yet to drain a battery
customer_reviews.author: Michael Butler

customer_reviews.title: Get it.  You'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: Not using a corded blower. It's the little things in life. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlena Thornton

customer_reviews.title: throw away the electrical cord and be blown away
customer_reviews.text: Now I can just pick up the blower and turn it on. No hassle with power cords.
customer_reviews.author: Tlusa84757

customer_reviews.title: Starts every time!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for a quick clean up after cutting the grass. The batteries last a good while considering the velocity of the air the tool puts out.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Bigger battery really help me so it can run longer
customer_reviews.text: Works great easy an brakes down so it will fit in the tool box of the truck great for job site blow down.
customer_reviews.author: Kerley

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy
customer_reviews.text: even better than I expected plenty of power and with the bigger battery's it lasts a good time
customer_reviews.author: Rob Gadourey

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Junk!! Drained 2 batteries in less than 5 minutes and didn't even allow enough time to blow off my driveway. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power and works well
customer_reviews.text: Uses a lot of battery quickly at constant full power. I have extra M18 batts so no problem for the job
customer_reviews.author: age 68

customer_reviews.title: The bigger the battery the better
customer_reviews.text: Product has ver good power, uses battery fairly fast. But well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golfdawg
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product. Did a great job. Wish the battery life was a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B. Hegwood

customer_reviews.title: It has two speeds.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to blow snow of my porch and walkways
customer_reviews.author: dan colville

customer_reviews.title: One excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best leaf blowers one could purchase
customer_reviews.author: Boise Blast

customer_reviews.title: own all Milwaukee tools
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for hubby and he loves it and I love it because now my patio is always clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian M King

customer_reviews.title: My son in law thought this would be the best choice for him.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, so I will be unable to rate it until it is used later.
customer_reviews.author: P Barton

customer_reviews.title: Ease of operation !
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it ! Perfect for my daily use !
customer_reviews.author: Tonya J Brown

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Not strong enough to even blow off water. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Power for the job
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as I thought it would be, but did the job. Wouldn’t use it for leaf pickup, but cleaning up grass clippings after mowing is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parks
